Synopsis:
1873. Arizona Territory. A stranger (Craig) with no memory at all, and whose only clue to his mysterious past is a brand around one wrist, reaches the city of Absolution in the midst of the harsh wilderness. She discovers that aliens are not welcome, and in the streets no one makes any motion unless ordered by the iron hand of Colonel Dolarhyde (Ford). It is a people living in fear.

But Absolution is about to experience a fear that they can barely understand when the desolate city is attacked by "marauders" in the sky. With a deafening roar as they descend at an incredible pace and bright lights are abducting helpless inhabitants one by one, these monsters completely change everything that residents thought they knew.

Now, the stranger turned down is the only hope for salvation, when the gunslinger slowly starts to remember who you are and where you've been realizing that hides a secret that can give people the opportunity to fight the alien force. With the help of the elusive traveler Ella (Wilde), which brings together a squad made up of former bourgeois opponents, Dolarhyde and his boys, outlaws, outlaws and Apache warriors, all of them enemies to each other but united in danger of annihilation against a common enemy against which prepares an epic showdown for survival.

Production notes:
Movie based on the graphic novel written by Fred Van Lente and Andrew Foley.
